text: "He Will, She Knows" is a song recorded by American country music artist Kenny Rogers. It was released in July 2000 as the first single from the album There You Go Again. The song reached #32 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Frank Rogers and Steve Leslie and features harmony vocals from Collin Raye and Diamond Rio. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2000) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2000 singles Category:2000 songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs Category:Collin Raye songs Category:Diamond Rio songs Category:Songs written by Frank Rogers (record producer)
title: He Will, She Knows
